metadata.name: THE NEEDLE
metadata.description:
Artist: Jay Kyren
Location: The Alps, France

THE NEEDLE: An ode to the mountains, the people who climb them and those who protect them.

This piece kicks off my new body of work and collection: "Shoulders of Giants‚Äù

Embarking on a journey around the world to photograph the most unique & colossal creations of Earth.
I want to tell the story of these places, showcase their raw power and document my journey to raise awareness. 

This first piece will help fund the beginning of this endeavour.

By giving back 20% of the sales of the following pieces from this collection to environmental agencies that defend the natural world from destruction, I will make sure this enterprise is not only about self-discovery & growth but also helping bring the light on a subject that matters.
